00022 JWtHome::JWtHome(const WEnvironment& env)
00023   : Home(env, 
00024       "JWt, Java Web Toolkit",
00025       "jwt-home", "css/jwt")
00026 {
00027   addLanguage(Lang("en", "/", "en", "English"));
00028 
00029   char* jwtExamplePath  = getenv("JWT_EXAMPLE_PATH");
00030   if (jwtExamplePath)
00031     jwtExamplePath_ = jwtExamplePath;
00032   else
00033     jwtExamplePath_ = "/home/pieter/projects/jwt/wt-port/java/examples/";
00034 
00035   init();
00036 }
00037 
00038 WWidget *JWtHome::examples()
00039 {
00040   WContainerWidget *result = new WContainerWidget();
00041 
00042   result->addWidget(new WText(tr("home.examples")));
00043 
00044   examplesMenu_ = new WTabWidget(AlignTop | AlignJustify, result);
00045 
00046   /*
00047    * The following code is functionally equivalent to:
00048    *
00049    *   examplesMenu_->addTab(helloWorldExample(), "Hello world");
00050    *
00051    * However, we optimize here for memory consumption (it is a homepage
00052    * after all, and we hope to be slashdotted some day)
00053    *
00054    * Therefore, we wrap all the static content (including the tree
00055    * widgets), into WViewWidgets with static models. In this way the
00056    * widgets are not actually stored in memory on the server.
00057    */
00058 
00059   // The call ->setPathComponent() is to use "/examples/" instead of
00060   // "/examples/hello_world" as internal path
00061   examplesMenu_->addTab(wrapView(&JWtHome::helloWorldExample),
00062                         tr("hello-world"))->setPathComponent("");
00063   examplesMenu_->addTab(wrapView(&JWtHome::chartExample),
00064                         tr("charts"));
00065   examplesMenu_->addTab(wrapView(&JWtHome::treeviewExample),
00066                         tr("treeview"));
00067   examplesMenu_->addTab(wrapView(&JWtHome::composerExample),
00068                         tr("mail-composer"));
00069   examplesMenu_->addTab(wrapView(&JWtHome::chatExample),
00070                         tr("chat"));
00071   examplesMenu_->addTab(wrapView(&JWtHome::figtreeExample),
00072                         tr("figtree"));
00073   
00074   // Enable internal paths for the example menu
00075   examplesMenu_->setInternalPathEnabled("/examples");
00076   examplesMenu_->currentChanged().connect(this, &Home::googleAnalyticsLogger);
00077 
00078   return result;
00079 }
00080 
00081 WWidget *JWtHome::download()
00082 {
00083   WContainerWidget *result = new WContainerWidget();
00084   result->addWidget(new WText(tr("home.download")));
00085   result->addWidget(new WText(tr("home.download.license")));
00086   result->addWidget(new WText(tr("home.download.packages")));
00087 
00088   releases_ = new WTable();
00089   readReleases(releases_);
00090   result->addWidget(releases_);
00091   result->addWidget(new WText(tr("home.download.requirements")));
00092   result->addWidget(new WText(tr("home.download.cvs")));
00093 
00094   return result;
00095 }
00096 
00097 WWidget *JWtHome::sourceViewer(const std::string &deployPath)
00098 {
00099   return new ExampleSourceViewer(deployPath, jwtExamplePath_ + "/", "JAVA");
00100 }
00101 
00102 WWidget *JWtHome::example(const char *textKey, const std::string& sourceDir)
00103 {
00104   WContainerWidget *result = new WContainerWidget();
00105   new WText(tr(textKey), result);
00106   result->addWidget(linkSourceBrowser(sourceDir));
00107   return result;
00108 }
00109 
00110 WWidget *JWtHome::helloWorldExample()
00111 {
00112   return example("home.examples.hello", "hello");
00113 }
00114 
00115 WWidget *JWtHome::chartExample()

00117   return example("home.examples.chart", "charts");
00118 }

00130 WWidget *JWtHome::chatExample()
00131 {
00132   return example("home.examples.chat", "simplechat");
00133 }
00134 
00135 WWidget *JWtHome::figtreeExample()
00136 {
00137   WContainerWidget *result = new WContainerWidget();
00138   new WText(tr("home.examples.figtree"), result);
00139   return result;
00140 }

00142 WWidget *JWtHome::wrapView(WWidget *(JWtHome::*createWidget)())
00143 {
00144   return makeStaticModel(boost::bind(createWidget, this));
00145 }
00146 
00147 WApplication *createJWtHomeApplication(const WEnvironment& env)
00148 {
00149   return new JWtHome(env);
00150 }
